comments:
I200503030-0500, Motif, KDE 3.3.2, X.org 6.8.2, Linux 2.6.10

I went to the "show view" dialog, and opened "Basic > Browser".  The view
appeared, but its contents simply said "Unable to create view: An unexpected
exception was thrown".  The exception is as follows:

My mistake - I was trying to decode a style encoded in the secondary ID that 
is null when the view is opened from the UI.

Fixed.
